text:
-&Bi ja#yatyagniqcita(gm)# haq vA aqmuShmi#n ~MlOqkE vAtOq&Bi pa#vatE vAtanAqmAni# juhOtyaqByE#vaina#-maqmuShmi#n ~MlOqkE vAta#H pavatEq trINi# juhOtiq traya# iqmE lOqkA EqBya Eqva lOqkEByOq vAtaqmava# rundhE samuqdrO#&siq naBa#svAqnityA#haiqtadvai vAta#sya rUqpa(gm) rUqpENaiqva vAtaqmava# rundhE &~jjaqlinA# juhOtiq na hyE#tEShA#maqnyathA ( ) &&hu#tiravaqkalpa#tE || 46
(OSha#dhayaH saqptA - Bi - diSOq - &nyathAq - dvE ca#) (A9)
